document_data.name: House of a Thousand Faces
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of a Thousand Faces''' was a tavern located in the [[Blacklake District]] of [[Neverwinter]]. It was the headquarters of the [[Harpers]] of Neverwinter in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building was named after the many mirrors and mannequins positioned around its common room.
document_data.Besides: Besides being a tavern, the House of a Thousand Faces was also an inn. A night in the House cost 1 [[Currency|gp]] per guest.
document_data.History:
The House of a Thousand Faces was originally a clothing boutique. After the [[Ruining]] of [[1451 DR]], the owner, an [[Noble eladrin|eladrin]] named [[Theryis]], closed her business and left the city.

Theryis returned a few years later, alongside her half-brother [[Toram]], both of them now [[Harper agent]]s. She re-purposed her old business as a tavern, to serve as an undercover base for the Harpers operating in the city.

In [[1479 DR]], during the unrest in Neverwinter because of the actions of the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]], a group of [[adventurer]]s had to pacify a group of extremist followers of the "Lost Heir", who were purging all of [[Dagult Neverember]]'s loyalist in the Blacklake District, when those extremists attacked them while they were in the tavern.
